title: Introduction to HTML
detailedDescription: This course covers HTML tags, structure, and how to create web pages using HTML.

title: CSS for Beginners
detailedDescription: Learn how to style web pages using CSS, including flexbox, grid, and animations.

title: JavaScript Essentials
detailedDescription: Learn the fundamentals of JavaScript, including variables, loops, and functions.

title: React Basics
detailedDescription: Learn how to build dynamic web applications using React.js.

title: Advanced CSS Techniques
detailedDescription: Master advanced CSS techniques like flexbox, CSS grid, and responsive design.

title: Node.js for Backend
detailedDescription: This course covers server-side development using Node.js and Express.

title: MongoDB for Beginners
detailedDescription: Learn how to design, build, and manage NoSQL databases using MongoDB.

title: Full Stack Development with MERN
detailedDescription: This course covers the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js).

title: Python for Data Science
detailedDescription: This course covers Python libraries like Pandas and NumPy for data analysis.

title: Machine Learning with Python
detailedDescription: Learn machine learning techniques using Python, including regression, classification, and clustering.

title: UI/UX Design for Beginners
description: Learn the principles of UI/UX design.
detailedDescription: This course covers user-centered design, wireframing, and prototyping using Figma.

title: SQL for Data Analysis
detailedDescription: This course covers SQL queries for data extraction, manipulation, and analysis.

title: Android App Development
detailedDescription: This course covers Android app development using Java and Android Studio.

title: iOS Development with Swift
detailedDescription: This course covers app development for iOS devices using Swift and Xcode.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
detailedDescription: Learn the most common data structures and algorithms used in technical interviews.

title: AWS Cloud for Beginners
detailedDescription: This course covers the basics of AWS, including EC2, S3, and cloud services.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Learn how to build blockchain applications.
detailedDescription: This course covers the fundamentals of blockchain technology and how to develop decentralized applications.

title: DevOps with Docker and Kubernetes
detailedDescription: Learn how to use Docker and Kubernetes for containerized applications and orchestration.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
detailedDescription: This course covers cybersecurity principles, including encryption, network security, and ethical hacking.

title: Digital Marketing
detailedDescription: This course covers SEO, content marketing, social media, and analytics tools.
